00024   using namespace std;

00026   void GeoCoords::Reset(const std::string& s, bool centerp) {
00027     vector<string> sa;
00028     const char* spaces = " \t\n\v\f\r,"; // Include comma as a space
00029     for (string::size_type pos0 = 0, pos1; pos0 != string::npos;) {
00030       pos1 = s.find_first_not_of(spaces, pos0);
00031       if (pos1 == string::npos)
00032         break;
00033       pos0 = s.find_first_of(spaces, pos1);
00034       sa.push_back(s.substr(pos1, pos0 == string::npos ? pos0 : pos0 - pos1));
00035     }
00036     if (sa.size() == 1) {
00037       int prec;
00038       MGRS::Reverse(sa[0], _zone, _northp, _easting, _northing, prec, centerp);
00039       UTMUPS::Reverse(_zone, _northp, _easting, _northing,
00040                       _lat, _long, _gamma, _k);
00041     } else if (sa.size() == 2) {
00042       DMS::DecodeLatLon(sa[0], sa[1], _lat, _long);
00043       UTMUPS::Forward( _lat, _long,
00044                        _zone, _northp, _easting, _northing, _gamma, _k);
00045     } else if (sa.size() == 3) {
00046       unsigned zoneind, coordind;
00047       if (sa[0].size() > 0 && isalpha(sa[0][sa[0].size() - 1])) {
00048         zoneind = 0;
00049         coordind = 1;
00050       } else if (sa[2].size() > 0 && isalpha(sa[2][sa[2].size() - 1])) {
00051         zoneind = 2;
00052         coordind = 0;
00053       } else
00054         throw GeographicErr("Neither " + sa[0] + " nor " + sa[2]
00055                             + " of the form UTM/UPS Zone + Hemisphere"
00056                             + " (ex: 38N, 09S, N)");
00057       UTMUPS::DecodeZone(sa[zoneind], _zone, _northp);
00058       for (unsigned i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00059         (i ? _northing : _easting) = DMS::Decode(sa[coordind + i]);
00060       UTMUPS::Reverse(_zone, _northp, _easting, _northing,
00061                       _lat, _long, _gamma, _k);
00062       FixHemisphere();
00063     } else
00064       throw GeographicErr("Coordinate requires 1, 2, or 3 elements");
00065     CopyToAlt();
00066   }
00067 
00068 
00069   string GeoCoords::GeoRepresentation(int prec) const {
00070     prec = max(0, min(9, prec) + 5);
00071     ostringstream os;
00072     os << fixed << setprecision(prec);
00073     if (_lat == _lat)
00074       os << _lat;
00075     else
00076       os << "nan";
00077     os << " ";
00078     if (_long == _long)
00079       os << _long;
00080     else
00081       os << "nan";
00082     return os.str();
00083   }
00084 
00085   string GeoCoords::DMSRepresentation(int prec) const {
00086     prec = max(0, min(10, prec) + 5);
00087     return DMS::Encode(_lat, unsigned(prec), DMS::LATITUDE) +
00088       " " + DMS::Encode(_long, unsigned(prec), DMS::LONGITUDE);
00089   }
00090 
00091   string GeoCoords::MGRSRepresentation(int prec) const {
00092     // Max precision is um
00093     prec = max(0, min(6, prec) + 5);
00094     string mgrs;
00095     MGRS::Forward(_zone, _northp, _easting, _northing, _lat, prec, mgrs);
00096     return mgrs;
00097   }
00098 
00099   string GeoCoords::AltMGRSRepresentation(int prec) const {
00100     // Max precision is um
00101     prec = max(0, min(6, prec) + 5);
00102     string mgrs;
00103     MGRS::Forward(_alt_zone, _northp, _alt_easting, _alt_northing, _lat, prec,
00104                   mgrs);
00105     return mgrs;
00106   }
00107 
00108   void GeoCoords::UTMUPSString(int zone, real easting, real northing, int prec,
00109                                std::string& utm) const {
00110     ostringstream os;
00111     prec = max(-5, min(9, prec));
00112     real scale = prec < 0 ? pow(real(10), -prec) : real(1);
00113     os << UTMUPS::EncodeZone(zone, _northp) << fixed << setfill('0');
00114     if (Math::isfinite(easting)) {
00115       os << " " << setprecision(max(0, prec)) << easting / scale;
00116       if (prec < 0 && abs(easting / scale) > real(0.5))
00117         os << setw(-prec) << 0;
00118     } else
00119       os << " nan";
00120     if (Math::isfinite(northing)) {
00121       os << " " << setprecision(max(0, prec)) << northing / scale;
00122       if (prec < 0 && abs(northing / scale) > real(0.5))
00123         os << setw(-prec) << 0;
00124     } else
00125       os << " nan";
00126     utm = os.str();
00127   }
00128 
00129   string GeoCoords::UTMUPSRepresentation(int prec) const {
00130     string utm;
00131     UTMUPSString(_zone, _easting, _northing, prec, utm);
00132     return utm;
00133   }
00134 
00135   string GeoCoords::AltUTMUPSRepresentation(int prec) const {
00136     string utm;
00137     UTMUPSString(_alt_zone, _alt_easting, _alt_northing, prec, utm);
00138     return utm;
00139   }
00140 
00141   void GeoCoords::FixHemisphere() {
00142     if (_lat == 0 || (_northp && _lat >= 0) || (!_northp && _lat < 0) ||
00143         _lat != _lat)
00144       // Allow either hemisphere for equator
00145       return;
00146     if (_zone != UTMUPS::UPS) {
00147       _northing += (_northp ? 1 : -1) * UTMUPS::UTMShift();
00148       _northp = !_northp;
00149     } else
00150       throw GeographicErr("Hemisphere mixup");
00151   }
